p: We followed the same approach to estimate the thermal niche and potential distribution of the species using paleoclimatic data for the Last Glacial Maximum (LGM; 21,000 YBP). For the estimation of the LGM temperatures we used a simulation of the general circulation model (GCM) from the Community Climate System Model (CCSM, www.ccsm.ucar.edu) 27. The original GCM data were downloaded from the PMIP2 website ( http://www.pmip2.cnrs-gif.fr/).
